body:
OK, @mattbridges explained the process. Sorry about the multiple pull requests, won't happen again now that I know what to do. I think the current proposed version of guides/source/asset_pipeline.md in the pull request looks pretty good. Formatted the json manifest file within 80 columns.




________________________________
 From: Steve Klabnik <notifications@github.com>
To: rails/rails <rails@noreply.github.com> 
Cc: Adrien Lamothe <alamoz@yahoo.com> 
Sent: Saturday, July 6, 2013 6:29 AM
Subject: Re: [rails] Rails 4 update of 'The Asset Pipeline' guide. (#11326)
 


All you need to do is force push to the existing branch, please don't open up a zillion pull requests, it's confusing :(
—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
